name: Malachite // (225 g/mol - 3.950)
description:
Reputed to protect against the Evil Eye, witchcraft, and evil spirits, this stone is a powerful cleanser for the emotional body, releasing past-life or childhood trauma, but is best used by a qualified healer. An important protection stone, Malachite absorbs negative energies and pollutants from the environment and the body, soaking up plutonium and radiation, and clearing electromagnetic smog. 
Malachite can be used for scrying or to access other worlds, inner or outer. Journeying through Malachite's convoluted patterns assists in receiving insights from the subconscious or messages from the future.
